};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading Yarn Details..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error fetching Yarn details: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Yarn Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"YarnID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Yarn Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Yarn Count"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Color Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Color Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Weight (in Kgs)"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[Array.isArray(yarnDetails)&&yarnDetails.map(yarn=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.YarnID}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.YarnType}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.YarnCount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.ColorName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.ColorCode}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yarn.Weight})]},yarn.YarnID)),!Array.isArray(yarnDetails)&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Not an Array"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchYarn,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleBack,children:"Back"})})]});};export default YarnDetails;
